name: Police Cadet
overview: The adrenaline pumps through your veins as, all alone, you must shoot it out in the dark downtown subway station in the notoriously tough hoodlum district of the Bronx. The odds are stacked against you, as all you have is your trusty six-shot colt 45 to protect your life and the lives of others. What chance do you have to survive? Contains 3 sub games: Shoot Out Night Shift Shoplifter
